entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -31.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
